35.community_available_description:
There are 1 communities available. The infomation of these communitys are listed as follows:

community_5. sanhejiayuan is located at No. 2 and 4 Court, Sanhe North Lane, Daxing District, Beijing. The rent for this community is 25 dollars per square meter.In this community, sanhejiayuan is a contemporary community nestled in the tranquil outskirts of Beijing. This newly erected haven offers an escape from the hustle and bustle of city life. Enveloped by lush greenery and picturesque landscapes, residents can enjoy serene morning walks alongside babbling brooks and well-maintained pathways. Each building showcases modern architectural design with spacious balconies that provide panoramic views of the surrounding hills. . This commnunity is surrounded by: The subway includes Huangcun West Street; supermarkets include Sanhe Nanli Convenience Mall and Xiqingde Department Store; shopping malls include Bailian Qingcheng International Shopping Center and Jixing Deyi Life Plaza; hospitals include Daxing District Town Yonghua Beili Community Health Service Station; parks include Xingwang Park (South District); schools include the Experimental School Affiliated to the National Institute of Educational Administration, Daxing District No. 2 Primary School; restaurants include Tibetan Style Restaurant (Daxing Branch), Huangni Roast Pigeon (Huangcun Branch); banks include Tianjin Bank (Beijing Daxing Branch), Tianjin Bank 24-hour self-service banking (Daxing Branch)..

	The large_house in community_5 is a two rooms apartment, with an area of about 60-60.62, the monthly rent  is about 1500 dollars, and there are still 2 houses.
